name: The Hearse Song
description:
Directions:

WASD or Arrows to move. Uncover the picture and text while navigating the maze and avoiding slugs. There are seven levels total to get to the win condition.

Should you be unable to play or complete the game for any reason, then please watch this video of the gameplay.


Other information:

...This was heavily influenced by life events this week. On Sunday of our jam, my mother (who has lymphoma in her lungs) went into hospice care. On Monday of our jam, as a requirement of this care, I had to make funeral arrangements for when it happens...We all deal with grief differently. I make things. 

This isn't a 'fun' game. It's a sad one that intends to transmit feeling/empathy over fun. So I can see if it gets rated low in that area. Either way, I hope you like it.

This is the first time I've programmed/been on the developer side with Godot specifically.
